actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prohibit economic coercion based upon race, color, religion, national origin, or sex.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Economic Coercion Act - Prohibits economic coercion by any business enterprise or representative of such enterprise based upon race, color, religion, national origin, or sex. Authorizes any person aggrieved under this Act, or the Attorney General, to bring a civil action against the violator, in a United States District Court.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit economic coercion based upon race, color, religion, national origin, or sex.
